inventory.title: Warehouse inventory
inventory.desc: Physical verification of stock, identification of shortages/excesses, reconciliation with records, reporting and recommendations.

audit.title: Warehouse process audit
audit.desc: Diagnostics of receiving, storage, picking, shipping; loss detection; improvement plan with KPIs.

optimization.title: Optimization and implementation
optimization.desc: Zone redesign, address storage, routes, picking rules; reducing time and errors.

training.title: Training and support
training.desc: Instructions, staff training, performance monitoring, support after project completion.

wms.title: WMS - Warehouse Management System
wms.desc: Implementation and configuration of WMS systems for warehouse automation, inventory control and logistics optimization.

erp.title: ERP - Enterprise Resource Planning
erp.desc: Integration of warehouse processes with ERP systems, configuration of inventory management modules and data synchronization.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: Full reporting at every stage of work

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: Strict quality control at all stages

HomePage.newsAndArticlesDesc: Relevant information about warehouse logistics, new technologies and best practices

cookies.title: Privacy Policy - Inventory Uzbekistan
cookies.description: Privacy policy and personal data processing rules of Inventory Uzbekistan company.
cookies.pageSubtitle: Information on the collection, processing and protection of personal data
cookies.section1Text1: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter — “Policy”) regulates the procedure for processing and protecting personal data of users of the website https://www.inventory.uz (hereinafter — “Website”).
cookies.section1Text2: The operator of personal data is LLC “WS Consulting” (hereinafter — “Operator”).
cookies.section1Text3: The Policy has been developed in accordance with the Law of the Republic of Uzbekistan “On Personal Data” No. ЗРУ-547 dated July 2, 2019, and other applicable legal acts.
cookies.section2Intro: Personal data means any information relating to an identified or identifiable user, including:
section2List: data entered by the user in forms on the Website;
technical data: IP address, cookies, information about browser and device.
cookies.section3Intro: Personal data is processed exclusively for:
section3List: providing warehouse inventory and audit services;
communicating with users, including responding to requests and sending newsletters with consent;
complying with the requirements of the legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan;
analyzing website traffic and improving Website performance.
cookies.section4Text1: The legal basis for processing personal data is the user’s consent, expressed when filling out forms on the Website or when using the Website.
cookies.section4Text2: Processing may also be carried out to comply with the requirements of the legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
section5List: Personal data may be transferred to partners and contractors — strictly to fulfill contractual obligations;
to state authorities — in cases provided by law;
to third-party services (e.g., hosting providers, analytics systems).
cookies.section5Text1: Cross-border data transfer is possible to countries that ensure adequate protection of personal data (e.g., if using Google, Amazon servers or services).
cookies.section5Text2: Data is stored until the purposes of processing are achieved, but no longer than necessary.
cookies.section6Intro: The user has the right to:
section6List: receive information about the processing of their data;
request correction, blocking or deletion of data;
file a complaint with the authorized state body of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
cookies.section7Text: The Operator takes necessary organizational and technical measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, destruction, or distribution.
cookies.section8Text: The Operator reserves the right to update this Policy. The new version comes into force from the moment it is published on the Website.
cookies.section9Intro: For questions related to the processing of personal data, you can contact us:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Inventory Uzbekistan
privacy.description: Privacy policy regarding the collection, processing and protection of personal data by Inventory Uzbekistan.
privacy.pageSubtitle: Information on the collection, processing and protection of personal data

1.title: 1. General Provisions
content: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the “Policy”) regulates the procedure for processing and protecting personal data of users of the website https://www.inventory.uz (hereinafter referred to as the “Website”).
The operator of personal data is LLC “WS Consulting” (hereinafter referred to as the “Operator”).
This Policy has been developed in accordance with the Law of the Republic of Uzbekistan “On Personal Data” No. ЗРУ-547 dated July 2, 2019, as well as other applicable regulations.

2.title: 2. Personal Data
content: Personal data refers to any information relating to an identified or identifiable user, including:
list: data entered by the user in forms on the Website;
technical data: IP address, cookies, information about the browser and device.

3.title: 3. Purpose of Processing
content: Personal data is processed exclusively for the following purposes:
list: providing warehouse inventory and audit services;
communicating with users, including responding to requests and sending newsletters with consent;
compliance with the laws of the Republic of Uzbekistan;
analyzing website traffic and improving Website performance.

4.title: 4. Legal Grounds
content: The basis for processing personal data is the user’s consent, expressed by filling out forms on the Website or using the Website.
Processing may also be carried out to comply with the requirements of the laws of the Republic of Uzbekistan.

5.title: 5. Data Transfer and Storage
content: Personal data may be transferred to partners and contractors — strictly for the fulfillment of contractual obligations;
to government authorities — in cases provided by law;
to third-party services (e.g., hosting providers, analytics systems).
Cross-border transfer of data is possible to countries that ensure adequate protection of personal data (e.g., when using Google, Amazon servers).
Data is stored until the purposes of processing are achieved, but not longer than necessary.

6.title: 6. User Rights
content: The user has the right to:
list: obtain information about the processing of their data;
request correction, blocking, or deletion of data;
file a complaint with the authorized state body of the Republic of Uzbekistan.

7.title: 7. Security Measures
content: The Operator takes necessary organizational and technical measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, destruction, or distribution.

8.title: 8. Changes to the Policy
content: The Operator reserves the right to update this Policy. The new version enters into force from the moment it is published on the Website.

9.title: 9. Contacts
content: For questions related to the processing of personal data, you can contact us:
